text: thumb The Erindale Academy is an independent co-ed high school located in Mississauga, Ontario, Canada. It is currently situated in the historic neighbourhood of Erindale, across from Erindale Park and the University of Toronto Mississauga. == History == The Academy was once known as the Froebel Education Centre, an independent elementary school that taught children from kindergarten to grade 8. The Froebel Education Centre was in operation from 1970 to 2016. == References == Category:Education in Mississauga Category:Private schools
title: The Erindale Academy
